Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> @Patrick ManBearPig there was a scammer that offerred 0.1 BTC for listing on Stex, which the Verus Coin Foundation, a contributing organization, but also part of the Verus community, paid and was scammed. Then, Stex came back and said they would want to list Verus, but the fee would be 1 BTC, which was partially raised by individuals the community and the rest paid by the Foundation.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> That was a lesson learned, but not a big hit for the Foundation and not the community.
